message.content: In the file c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\pages\productos\[slug].astro, search for all dark mode related styles and any styles for "spec-card", "trust-card", "detail-spec", or similar card-like sections that show product specifications. Also look for icon-related styles. Return the relevant CSS sections with line numbers.

content.text: I'll search for the dark mode related styles and card-like sections in the product detail page.

content.content: 1→--- 2→import MainLayout from '../../layouts/MainLayout.astro'; 3→import Breadcrumb from '../../components/Breadcrumb.astro'; 4→import ProductCard from '../../components/ProductCard.astro'; 5→import AddToQuoteBtn from '../../components/islands/AddToQuoteBtn.tsx'; 6→import VariantSelector from '../../components/islands/VariantSelector.tsx'; 7→import ImageGallery from '../../components/islands/ImageGallery.tsx'; 8→import RecentlyViewed from '../../components/islands/RecentlyViewed.tsx'; 9→import { getCollection } from 'astro:content'; 10→import { siteConfig } from '../../data/site-config'; 11→import { slugify } from '../../utils/slugify'; 12→import { applicationTags } from '../../data/application-tags'; 13→import { complementaryCategories } from '../../data/complementary-categories'; 14→import { getCategoryPlaceholderSvg } from '../../utils/category-placeholders'; 15→ 16→export async function getStaticPaths() { 17→ const products = (await getCollection('products')).filter(p => p.data.categorySlug !== 'servicios'); 18→ return products.map(product => { 19→ const sameCategory = products.filter( 20→ p => p.data.categorySlug === product.data.categorySlug && p.data.sku !== product.data.sku 21→ ); 22→ const sorted = [...sameCategory].sort((a, b) => a.data.sku.localeCompare(b.data.sku)); 23→ let related = sorted.slice(0, 4); 24→ 25→ if (related.length < 3) { 26→ const otherCategory = products.filter( 27→ p => p.data.categorySlug !== product.data.categorySlug && p.data.sku !== product.data.sku 28→ ); 29→ const otherSorted = [...otherCategory].sort((a, b) => a.data.sku.localeCompare(b.data.sku)); 30→ related = [...related, ...otherSorted.slice(0, 4 - related.length)]; 31→ } 32→ 33→ // Complementary products from related categories 34→ const compCategorySlugs = complementaryCategories[product.data.categorySlug] || []; 35→ const complementary = products 36→ .filter(p => compCategorySlugs.includes(p.data.categorySlug) && p.data.sku !== product.data.sku) 37→ .sort((a, b) => a.data.sku.localeCompare(b.data.sku)) 38→ .slice(0, 4); 39→ 40→ return { 41→ params: { slug: slugify(product.data.title) }, 42→ props: { 43→ product: product.data, 44→ relatedProducts: related.map(p => p.data), 45→ complementaryProducts: complementary.map(p => p.data), 46→ }, 47→ }; 48→ }); 49→} 50→ 51→const { product, relatedProducts, complementaryProducts } = Astro.props; 52→const specsEntries = Object.entries(product.specs); 53→const allImages = [ 54→ ...(product.image ? [product.image] : []), 55→ ...(product.images || []), 56→]; 57→const tags = applicationTags[product.categorySlug] || []; 58→const productSlug = slugify(product.title); 59→ 60→// Spec icon mapping for stat cards 61→const specIconMap: Record = { 62→ 'material': '', 63→ 'peso': '', 64→ 'longitud': '', 65→ 'largo': '', 66→ 'diámetro': '', 67→ 'resistencia': '', 68→ 'capacidad': '', 69→ 'voltaje': '', 70→ 'corriente': '', 71→ 'temperatura': '', 72→ 'vida': '', 73→ 'profundidad': '', 74→ 'conexión': '', 75→ 'tipo': '', 76→ 'norma': '', 77→ 'dimensiones': '', 78→}; 79→const defaultSpecIcon = ''; 80→ 81→function getSpecIcon(label: string): string { 82→ const lower = label.toLowerCase(); 83→ for (const [key, svg] of Object.entries(specIconMap)) { 84→ if (lower.includes(key)) return svg; 85→ } 86→ return defaultSpecIcon; 87→} 88→--- 89→ 90→ 91→ {/* JSON-LD Product schema for Google Shopping / Rich Results */} 92→ 432→ 433→ 1230→
